positive: Knockback on the target and shooter
neutral: [Hidden] This weapon reloads its entire clip at once
changes: The Force-A-Nature now correctly knocks back players on the ground.
The minimum damage required for the Force-A-Nature to cause a knockback was increased from 30 to 40.

positive: Knockback on the target and shooter
neutral: [Hidden] This weapon reloads its entire clip at once
changes: Fixed grounded players receiving falling damage from shots fired directly above them.
Fixed the Force-A-Nature firing fewer pellets when tf_use_fixed_weaponspreads was 1.

positive: Knockback on the target and shooter
neutral: [Hidden] This weapon reloads its entire clip at once
changes: Knockback now only occurs when the shots deal more than 30 damage and the enemy is in close range.
The angle of the Force-A-Nature when fired determines the knockback.
It no longer affects grounded targets as much.

positive: Knockback on the target and shooter
neutral: [Hidden] This weapon reloads its entire clip at once
changes: Knockback now only works in close range, similar to the compression blast.
The effect can no longer be used to juggle enemies.
Self-knockback is altered to respect the Scout's view angle.
Knockback became scaled by an indeterminate amount of damage done.
